app.title: Music AI: Song Generator/Maker
app.description:
AI Music is Here and it's INSANE! Music AI App powered by Suno AI V4 and Udio AI, the best AI Music Generator you might've heard. 

Music AI leverages cutting-edge artificial intelligence to empower anyone to effortlessly create cover, generate lyrics, make songs and compose music across a multitue of genres and styles, including metal, pop, blues, rock, jazz, funk, rap, classical, EDM, electronic, instrumental and more. Whether you're crafting beats,remixing classics, or exploring new sounds, Suno and Udio Music AI transforms your musical ideas and texts into amazing tracks.

Key Features:

Instant Song Generation: With just a few taps, our robust AI generates songs, beats and banger ai covers tailored to your chosen style. Experience the thrill of creating original music and remixes without any formal training or knowledge.

Versatile Music Maker: With Music AI app for Android and the help of professional music styles prompts, music making app, banger ai covers, effortlessly mix, remix and master your tracks.

Powerful Lyric Generator: It's not only about tunes and sounds, with our AI lyric generator function built in, Music AI might just becomes your own Lyric Studio. Become song writer and rap maker in just one tap. 

AI Voice Generator: Jammable music maker jam with AI singing by synthesia AI, lalal.ai, and duet ai.  You can dive into a wide array of musical possibilities with our extensive selection of instruments and sound effects. Elevate your tracks with unique sounds and create music that truly stands out.

High-Quality Outputs: Music AI ensures that every track you create has studio-quality sound. Our advanced technology is engineered to produce clear, professional-sounding music that captures your unique artistic vision.

Save, Share and Collaborate: Easily save your creations and share them across social platforms like Facebook, X, TikTok, or even monetize with Music AI. Music distribution becomes easy. Collaborate with other artists and producers within the Suno AI, Udio AI, Musicfy and Voicify AI community to push musical boundaries and innovate together. 

Why Music AI powered by Suno?

Music AI isn't just a song generator, it's instrumental maker, it's music writer, it's ai singer,  it's stemz ai tool for musicians, it's a full-fledged aiva music production studio that enables you to create beats, write lyrics, and produce full-scale musical projects. Our platform supports all aspects of music creation, from laying down basic tracks to developing intricate remixes and musical compositions, amper music composition and soundraw. 

Continuously Evolving:
We regularly update Music AI with new features, sounds, genres, and enhancements to continually enrich your music creation experience. 

Transform your musical visions into reality with Music AI powered by Suno & Udio. Download now and start crafting your own music, beats, and remixes today!

app.summary: Make Song with Suno ai. Create AI Cover Voice. Generate Video with advanced AI.

reviews.text: If music could automatically come to a song and become a song, that would be a new experience. When such a thing becomes possible, it would cause a big revolution in the music industry. This would be a new opportunity for composers and singers. Just by humming a melody, someone would automatically create a whole song. Not only that, it would also give a new experience to those who listen to music. They would be able to hear even a small thought in their mind as a song. But, at the same time, thi

This app layout design looks good but everything else about it sucks! First there is no option to see how well their app works. Second you sign up via Google or e-mail but the better apps like this won't require until you gone past free trial. Tried to delete account, they have some technical problem. As a result, just total bad experience, with a horrible business model. There are plenty of similar apps that are either try before you buy or free to use, just looking for them.

I paid the full 60 because the app was initially very good. It was honestly spotless even with some of the worst lyrics I put in. Unfortunately, lately, that has not been the case. In fact it cant seem to pronounce a single word right. Ever since the new update, not only can the AI not speak coherently at all, but its pointless to give it instructions because it will change them to something random when it generates the song not a single thing/feat works right or comes close to the request made.

my personal fav of the various off shoots by the company, it's def stable and not buggy, very slow being updated but that's cool with me, made some extremely catchy songs with these arrangements, never had to wait from being overloaded servers and now since it's the last one I use to finish updating, I've used all different versions, this is the one I'll spend my money on, excellent easy to use fun, disgustingly catchy arrangements this is the best!

it's an amazing app, but for some reason, it won't let me extend a song of my choice anymore, it keeps saying "not a valid template error" so I'm kinda considering uninstalling the app, but hopefully it will be fixed

this app is simply the best I have seen so far. very easy to use. is hard to know, if is ai that is singing. it sing like a real human. 5 star for this app. if you want this app to give you a good and nice music, no too much words or prompt.

I have been really enjoying this app since I downloaded it, I have made a couple of songs that I have written the lyrics for, and as I can't play a musical instrument I could never put them to music until now and they turned out better than expected. I really appreciate the effort put in by the makers of this app, so that's why I'm giving it 5 stars. well done guys. üòÄüëç.

I subscribed to this app and was really enjoying it for around a month. Unfortunately now whenever I try to generate a song, for some reason it just loads for a very long time (20-30mins) before it finally informs me that the song failed to be created. I've tried so many things to fix it, deleted all other songs, uninstalled and reinstalled the app etc. I do get my credits back, however the time wasted trying to get even 1 song to work makes me want to unsubscribe üòü

*Edit* unfortunately has been crashing and giving "invalid template error* when extending songs. makes it impossible to create and join 2 halves of a song. which is the only way to edit a created song and use the same voice, melody, and music. hopefully it's resolved or produce a refund.

Great potential but too many issues. I put in lyrics and had it create the same song with different styles probably 30+ times and only about 3 of those got the words right without repeating a verse or just completely mixing up words. Also none of the voices are wonderful. Still fun but needs work. I'm not going to continue the paid version.

app.developer: Video & Music AI - Create Video & Make Songs
app.developerLegalAddress: 1013 Centre Rd Ste 403S, Wilmington, DE 19805, United States
app.recentChanges: Enhance performance and stability, along with important bug fixes to improve user experience.
app.AIReview:
Music AI: Song Generator/Maker Review

Overview

Music AI: Song Generator/Maker has rapidly gained traction, boasting over 3.4 million installs and a solid 4.418772 rating ‚Äì a testament to its core function: generating music using artificial intelligence. Powered by Suno AI V4 and Udio AI, the app positions itself as an accessible tool for anyone wanting to create songs across a remarkably diverse range of genres. The marketing emphasizes ease of use and powerful capabilities, promising users can produce everything from metal anthems to classical compositions with minimal effort. The free price point is a significant draw, attracting a large user base eager to experiment with AI music generation without financial commitment.

Key Features

This app‚Äôs core functionality revolves around several key features designed to streamline the music creation process:

  • AI Song Generation: The primary feature allows users to input prompts ‚Äì describing desired genres (metal, pop, etc.), moods, and even specific instruments ‚Äì and the AI generates original songs. The use of Suno AI V4 and Udio AI suggests a sophisticated underlying engine capable of producing relatively complex musical arrangements.
  • Cover Voice Generation: Users can specify a vocal style to be applied to generated music, effectively creating AI covers mimicking various artists or genres. This expands possibilities beyond simply generating instrumental tracks.
  • Video Creation Integration (Advanced AI): The app boasts the ability to create videos alongside generated music using advanced AI. While details are scarce, this suggests integration with visual content creation tools ‚Äì a potentially powerful feature for users targeting short-form video platforms.
  • Genre Variety: The stated support for over twenty genres is impressive and represents a significant differentiator from simpler music generation apps. This breadth of options aims to cater to a wide range of musical interests.
  • Prompt Customization: Users can adjust prompt parameters like tempo, key, instrumentation, and even vocal characteristics to fine-tune the generated output.
  • Download & Export Options: The app allows users to download their creations in various formats (e.g., MP3) for personal use or further editing within other digital audio workstations (DAWs).

Strengths

  • Powerful AI Engine: The backing of Suno AI V4 and Udio AI immediately suggests a robust underlying technology capable of producing surprisingly high-quality music output, particularly considering the app‚Äôs free availability.
  • Genre Breadth: The extensive genre selection is a major strength. It significantly elevates this app beyond basic loop generators or simple melody creators. Users can genuinely explore diverse musical styles without needing to master traditional instruments or production skills.
  • Ease of Use: The marketing‚Äôs emphasis on ‚Äúeffortless creation‚Äù seems largely accurate. The interface, while potentially complex with many options, is designed for intuitive prompt input and result refinement.
  • Large User Base & Active Community (Potentially): 3.4 million installs demonstrates significant popularity, suggesting a potential community of users who can share prompts, results, and tips ‚Äì although the app‚Äôs review section doesn't explicitly confirm an active and engaged user community.

Areas for Improvement

  • Output Quality Consistency: Despite the powerful engine, the quality of generated music isn‚Äôt consistently exceptional across all genres or prompts. Some outputs are remarkably polished, while others can feel repetitive or lack a cohesive musical structure. This variability warrants attention from the developers.
  • Prompt Sensitivity: The AI appears sensitive to prompt phrasing. Subtle changes in wording can dramatically alter the output ‚Äì requiring experimentation and a degree of ‚Äúprompt engineering‚Äù to achieve desired results. More robust prompt guidance would be beneficial.
  • Limited Control Over Arrangement: While users can influence genre, tempo, and instruments, granular control over musical arrangement (e.g., adding fills, transitions, or complex harmonies) is currently lacking. This limits the app's appeal to experienced musicians seeking complete creative control.
  • Video Creation Feature Needs Expansion: The ‚Äúadvanced AI‚Äù video creation functionality feels underdeveloped. It would benefit from more intuitive controls for syncing visuals with music and offering a wider range of visual assets.

User Experience

The user interface is relatively clean and modern, utilizing a dark theme which is popular in creative applications. Navigating the various genre options and prompt settings can feel slightly overwhelming initially due to the sheer number of parameters available. The app's reliance on text-based prompts requires users to articulate their musical ideas clearly ‚Äì a skill that may be challenging for some. The generation process itself is relatively quick, typically taking between 10-30 seconds depending on complexity. However, the lack of real-time feedback during generation can be frustrating.

Value for Money

At its free price point, Music AI: Song Generator/Maker offers exceptional value. The core functionality ‚Äì AI song generation across a wide range of genres ‚Äì is entirely accessible without any cost. This makes it an ideal tool for beginners exploring music creation or anyone looking to quickly prototype musical ideas. The paid version (details not readily available) likely unlocks further features like higher resolution downloads, expanded genre access, and priority processing times, but the free version provides sufficient functionality for casual users.

Conclusion

Music AI: Song Generator/Maker is a surprisingly capable app leveraging advanced AI technology to empower music creation. While inconsistencies in output quality and limitations in arrangement control exist, the app's extensive genre selection, ease of use, and generous free price point make it a compelling option for anyone curious about exploring AI-powered music generation. The potential for future development ‚Äì particularly improvements to prompt sensitivity, arrangement controls, and the video creation feature ‚Äì will undoubtedly shape the app‚Äôs long-term success. It's a worthwhile download for both casual users and aspiring musicians looking to experiment with innovative tools.
